content.p: If you are keen to utilise your clinical skills and knowledge to provide medical and surgical treatment to animals, the clinical pathway route may be a good career route for you. The following pages explore some of the different areas of veterinary clinical practice in more detail and consider what you can be doing during your degree to enhance your knowledge and experience in your field of interest. Return to the Vets homepage Book a careers appointment Equine Exotic pets Farm animal Small animal care Veterinary officer in the Army Veterinary pathology Internships and residencies Veterinary nursing telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
